description.@en: I slip into character as quickly as another may slip into costume, altering my appearance and mannerisms with only minutes of preparation.

data.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: You may flip the results to succeed at Disguise Tests. When you succeed, it is always considered a Critical Success. In addition, when you successfully masquerade as a specific person, you can perfectly mimic their Allegiance.
